member_organisations: All members are natural persons and all are farmers.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: The Common Agricultural Policy, trade policy, environmental policy, climate change policy, EU Budget policy, rural development policy, food and food safety policy and all legislative issues that impact on farmers and rural communities.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: DRENNAN#Denis, ENRIGHT#John, MORRISON#Desmond, McCabe#Lorcan, McCormack#Patrick, O'CONNELL#Aine, O'LOUGHLIN#Shane, QUAIN#Gerald, SMYTH#Paul
relevant_communication: Hold meetings on a regular basis with MEPS, EU Commission officials, relevant Irish Minister responsible for EU policy proposals.   Publish position papers and press releases on various EU related policies.
goals__remit: ICMSA is a farm organisation representing approximately 18,000 dairy farmers in Ireland and our role is to represent their interests in all matters of policy that impact on their business.
